page.title: 06VISIT TO TAWSTOCK CHURCH
page.content: {OUR VISIT TO {TAWSTOCK CHURCH. {Outside. { We went to Tawstock Church on the 27th.June 1985 to answer some questions about the church and look around to find out different things. We looked around the outside of the church where there were lots of grave stones among the long,dry grass, many of the grave stones were very old and the writing had faded so it wasn't very clear. As we went round to the entrance, above the door was a very old sundial which was still there after many years. The entrance to the churchyard is by a handsome{lych gate}of fairly recent origin.
